about_the_game:
Dive into an exciting, immersive puzzle adventure where quick thinking and adaptability are key to success. Test your memory and skills as you progress through challenging levels, intense battles, and an engaging storyline.

Key Features

  • Solve fast-paced, memory-based puzzles: Memorize patterns and think quickly to overcome increasingly challenging obstacles.

  • Defeat bosses with RPG-inspired mechanics: Face powerful foes, each with unique abilities, and use strategy to defeat them.

  • Experience an immersive story: Unravel a gripping narrative as you advance through the game, adding depth to every puzzle you solve.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 320 or AMD Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A surprising mix of adventure and memory games, featuring RPG-inspired mechanics and immersive storytelling. Explore a crypt filled with traps, dangers, and hostile creatures. Will you uncover the crypt’s secrets, or will you become its next victim? Make strategic choices to survive.
